import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Cart } from 'src/app/model/cart'; import { Products } from '../products/products-list/products'; import { CartService } from './cart service/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit{ product:Array = []; cart:Array = []; constructor(public cartService:CartService, private router:Router, private route:ActivatedRoute){} ngOnInit(): void { this.cartService.getCart.subscribe({ next:(data:any)=>{ this.cart=data; }, error:(error:any)=>{ }, complete:()=>{ } }) } addToWishlist(product:any){ console.log(product); } backToProducts(){ this.router.navigate(["/products"], {relativeTo:this.route}) } }
